title: Young Exile
description: It is 1849 and fourteen year old Jess has lost her entire family to typhoid fever. Jess is forced to leave her London home when her Aunt arranges a position for her half way around the world in New Zealand. Abandoned and confused Jess sets foot in a new country clutching only a few possessions including her mothers journal. Suggested level: primary, intermediate.
author: Eliane Whitehouse
